long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ClickLearn Assist is used by users to get assistance on application processes within the browser.
The repository of processes will be loaded according to your login through this extension.
All processes must have been recorded using ClickLearn Studio and stored in the ClickLearn Cloud.
When the extension has been installed and you have logged in the assist icon will be added to the site. You may click the icon to get a list of your processes. Once you select a process and run it, it will guide you step by step through the process on the web page.
